name: Dice Thrower
description:
Defend the poker table from waves of rogue casino bots!

  • Throw dice at your foes and survive as long as possible.
  • Collect cards to gain special powers and customize your loadout.
  • Each dice has a different effect. Roll doubles for a more powerful effect!

Created by DishonoredHeir and myself for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam with the theme "Roll of the Dice".

How to Play:

  • WASD: Move
  • Left Click: Throw Dice
  • Scroll or 1-4: Focus on Card
  • E: Unselect Card
  • Q: Drop Card
